mapper.select: select distinct o.orderid as orderid, o.orderdate as orderdate, p.producttitle as producttitle, pi.productimageurl as productimageurl, p.productprice as productprice, o.orderamount as orderamount, o.orderaddress as orderaddress, o.orderdetailaddress as orderdetailaddress from orders o , product p, productimage pi, user u where pi.productid = p.productid and p.productid = o.productid AND pi.productimageidx = 1 and o.userid=#{userId};
